official_title: A bill to amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act to direct the General Accounting Office to conduct biennial audits of the accounts of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and transmit to Congress reports on the results of those audits.

summary.text: Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize and direct the General Accounting Office (GAO) to biennially review and audit the accounts of the Kennedy Center. Requires GAO to transmit a detailed report to Congress on the results of such reviews and audits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act to direct the General Accounting Office to conduct biennial audits of the accounts of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts and transmit to Congress reports on the results of those audits.
